DOC.brief_summary: This prospective randomized control study . The aim study 1. describe stress pattern experience CPR situation ; 2. investigate whether perceived stress associate CPR performance term hands-on time time start CPR ; 3. investigate whether task focus strategy reduces perceive stress level , 4. whether translates well CPR performance . Based finding clear , directive leadership enhance performance cardiac resuscitation , 5 ) investigate stress associate few leadership statement .
DOC.brief_title: Task Focusing Strategy During Simulated Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation
DOC.criteria: 4th year medical student No informed consent
